title: Y3shot
author: Y3shot
content: My follow beginner, hope your reason in investing in Bitcoin is not thinking to live large , buy good cars and to acquire mansions. If you ask most beginners what is their reason they choose to invest bitcoin all what you will understand from their reason is just want to make in different versions. Beginners should learn to know bitcoin is not a reason or a way to become rich .The reason in investing bitcoin should be just to level up financially, grow your money and get a better return of it. Beginners should not mistake bitcoin as to grow money and for making money(becoming rich). The principle of bitcoin is real , if you understand the principles it always turns out being profitable.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Yes, some people think that Bitcoin is a good investment because its value has gone up a lot over the past years. Basically, the idea is that you buy some Bitcoin and hold onto it for a while, hoping that its value will increase and you can sell it for a profit. However, it's important to remember that its value can go up and down quickly, and there's no guarantee that it will continue to go up in the future. Overall, while some people have made money by investing in Bitcoin, it's not a guaranteed way to grow your money. So, if you're interested in investing, it's a good idea to do your research, understand the risks involved, and to consider other options as well.

Then a couple of lines later you contradict yourself. I have no problem with people investing in bitcoin solely for the profits. Making money can be a good motivation, it depends on how one goes about it. The disadvantage of having that mentality is those people tend to move towards shitty projects and scams. But as long as you are consistently building your bitcoin portfolio, there is no way you can be at the short end of the stick. From my observation, many people are more concerned about hodling their bitcoins long term than actually using bitcoins as a payment option for regular stuff.
